channel.title: PK Kingdom Dev. Team Hiring web client coder!
channel.description:
PK Kingdom is looking for a webclient coder. You will have lots of privilages including forums mod and server admin!
[size=12pt][u][b]Requirements:[/b][/u][/size]
You know how to make a webclient from scratch! (i have the client though all you have to do is edit it a little) You must be able to add a link strip above webclient! You must be able to customise the webclient in various ways!
Thank you for your help, Elemenation2

item.title: PK Kingdom Dev. Team Hiring web client coder!
item.dc:creator: @elemenation_2 elemenation 2
item.description:
@elemenation_2 wrote:

yes its just jared and signed the problem i have is that i keep getting a error and have gave up do you know how to make one? P.S. nice client!

Read full topic

item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

You do know, that infact, there is almost no difference between a normal client and a webclient except for the obvious point that the webclient exists on the web?

item.description:
@elemenation_2 wrote:

dude on ide do just about anything what do u want? cause i realy want a webclient… and ur the only persoon who could maby make me one… plz help![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 15, 2007, 07:53:42 PM[/size][hr]if you can edit a client into a webclient thats goodenopugh for me… i just need somone who knows how thats all i was sayin.
